content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Juan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both of us. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can afford as a student, so I'm hoping for a price that reflects the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters. name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I appreciate your approach, Juan. As a landlord, I'm looking for a tenant who will treat the apartment well and respect the terms of the lease. Regarding the rent, I would like to ask for a fair price that reflects the location and amenities. What is your budget for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: As a student, I'm on a tight budget, so I'm hoping to find a place that won't stretch my finances too much. I'm willing to pay a price that is reasonable for the size and location of the apartment, but I'm also aware that the Munich market can be competitive. I'm looking to strike a balance between affordability and the quality of the living space. Is there a range you're considering for the rent?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand your concerns, Juan. As a landlord, I want to offer a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being mindful of your budget as a student. name: Heinrich Heine
